title: Critical sensitive information Disclosure. [HtUS]
steps: View the source code of the page or directly access: view-source:https://██████████.edu/database.php.orig
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the disclosure of sensitive database credentials (username, password, database name) in a publicly accessible file (database.php.orig) on the web server. This allows any attacker to potentially access the database and manipulate or extract sensitive data.
reason: The vulnerability was discovered by simply viewing the source code or accessing a file with a common backup extension (.orig). No complex interactions or multi-step attacks were required. The file was directly accessible without any authentication or special knowledge.
